known_issues: Section text is currently displayed with raw HTML tags instead of rendered rich text

existing_features.title: Update only the content rendered at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2] so that, when the underlying string contains HTML (e.g., <b>, <i>, <ul>, <a>), it is displayed as formatted rich text rather than showing the literal HTML tags.

new_feature_requests.summary: Render section text as formatted rich text instead of displaying raw HTML tags

projectName: Render selected section text as rich text (no visible HTML tags)
